name: Vitale #3
description: Your 2.08 carat square emerald cut diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its VVS1 clarity, very very small inclusions, is combined with a slightly tinted white I colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by its precise cut. The square emerald cut of your diamond combines the elegance of an emerald cut with a square shape. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
